publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1625 Bill Butler: Ae Fond Kissâ€”That the Parliament congratulates director, Ken Loach, and screenwriter, Paul Laverty, on the production of their thought-provoking film "Ae Fond Kiss" which received its UK premiere at the Edinburgh International Film Festival on 22 August 2004; applauds the performances of the cast, particularly the members of the local community in Glasgow who took part in the film, and recognises the economic benefits of a thriving Scottish film industry and the funding provided by the Scottish Executive through Scottish Screen and the Scottish Arts Council which has supported the work of Ken Loach on this film and his previous productions, "Sweet Sixteen" and "My Name is Joe."

S2M-1625 Ae Fond Kiss (lodged on 23 August 2004) Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Sarah Boyack*, Donald Gorrie*, Ms Sandra White*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Trish Godman*, Dennis Canavan*, Mike Watson*, Pauline McNeill*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-1625 Ae Fond Kiss (lodged on 23 August 2004) Colin Fox*, Rosie Kane*, Frances Curran*, Mary Scanlon*, Michael Matheson*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1625 Ae Fond Kiss (lodged on 23 August 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1625 Ae Fond Kiss (lodged on 23 August 2004) Scott Barrie*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1625 Ae Fond Kiss (lodged on 23 August 2004) Tricia Marwick*
S2M-1625 Ae Fond Kiss (lodged on 23 August 2004) Irene Oldfather*
